resources.name: Create new user
Login user
Verify email
Current user info
resources.description:
Returns information about the user currently logged in.

<!-- RESPONSE 200 -->
{
  "id": 3,
  "email": "user@kulturdaten.berlin",
  "remember_me_token": null,
  "created_at": "2021-03-26T22:03:20.000+01:00",
  "updated_at": "2021-03-26T22:03:20.000+01:00"
}

<!-- ENDRESPONSE -->

<!-- RESPONSE 401 -->
{
  "message": "E_UNAUTHORIZED: The action you try to perform is only allowed for authenticated users.",
  "code": "E_UNAUTHORIZED"
}

<!-- ENDRESPONSE -->

resources.name: List all organisations
resources.description:
This gets a unpaginated list of all organisations currently in the database.

<!-- RESPONSE 200 -->
{
  "organisations": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "created_at": "2021-03-25T15:27:28.000+01:00",
      "updated_at": "2021-03-25T15:27:28.000+01:00",
      "name": "Busse KG",
      "description": "New range of formal shirts are designed keeping you in mind. With fits and styling that will make you stand apart",
      "street1": "35115 Schreiner Village",
      "street2": null,
      "city": "Nord Elisabethburg",
      "zip_code": "43577"
    },
    {
      "id": 2,
      "created_at": "2021-03-25T15:27:28.000+01:00",
      "updated_at": "2021-03-25T15:27:28.000+01:00",
      "name": "MÃ¼ller - Roos",
      "description": "The automobile layout consists of a front-engine design, with transaxle-type transmissions mounted at the rear of the engine and four wheel drive",
      "street1": "732 Gummelt Ranch",
      "street2": null,
      "city": "Klingerland",
      "zip_code": "92711"
    }
  ],
  "status": 200
}

<!-- ENDRESPONSE -->

resources.name: Show organisation
resources.description:
Gets a single organisation specified by the ID, 18 in the example. If authenticated also contains a `members` key with an array containing all organisation members.

<!-- RESPONSE 200 -->
{
  "organisation": {
    "id": 18,
    "created_at": "2021-03-25T15:27:28.000+01:00",
    "updated_at": "2021-03-25T15:27:28.000+01:00",
    "name": "Busse KG",
    "description": "New range of formal shirts are designed keeping you in mind. With fits and styling that will make you stand apart",
    "street1": "35115 Schreiner Village",
    "street2": null,
    "city": "Nord Elisabethburg",
    "zip_code": "43577"
  },
  "status": 200
}

<!-- ENDRESPONSE -->

<!-- RESPONSE 200 -->
{
  "organisation": {
    "id": 18,
    "created_at": "2021-03-25T15:27:28.000+01:00",
    "updated_at": "2021-03-25T15:27:28.000+01:00",
    "name": "Busse KG",
    "description": "New range of formal shirts are designed keeping you in mind. With fits and styling that will make you stand apart",
    "street1": "35115 Schreiner Village",
    "street2": null,
    "city": "Nord Elisabethburg",
    "zip_code": "43577",
    "members": []
  },
  "status": 200
}

<!-- ENDRESPONSE -->

<!-- RESPONSE 400 -->

{
  "message": "E_ROW_NOT_FOUND: Row not found",
  "code": "E_ROW_NOT_FOUND"
}

<!-- ENDRESPONSE -->

resources.name: Create new organisation
resources.description:
Adds a new organisation to the database and returns it, if authenticated.

<!-- RESPONSE 200 -->
{
  "organisation": {
    "id": 18,
    "created_at": "2021-03-25T15:27:28.000+01:00",
    "updated_at": "2021-03-25T15:27:28.000+01:00",
    "name": "Busse KG",
    "description": "New range of formal shirts are designed keeping you in mind. With fits and styling that will make you stand apart",
    "street1": "35115 Schreiner Village",
    "street2": null,
    "city": "Nord Elisabethburg",
    "zip_code": "43577"
  },
  "status": 200,
  "message": "Organisation created successfully"
}

<!-- ENDRESPONSE -->

<!-- RESPONSE 401 -->
{
  "message": "E_UNAUTHORIZED: The action you try to perform is only allowed for authenticated users.",
  "code": "E_UNAUTHORIZED"
}

<!-- ENDRESPONSE -->

resources.name: Update organisation
resources.description:
Updates an organisation with new data and returns the updated instance, if authenticated.

<!-- RESPONSE 200 -->
{
  "organisation": {
    "id": 18,
    "created_at": "2021-03-25T15:27:28.000+01:00",
    "updated_at": "2021-03-25T15:27:28.000+01:00",
    "name": "Busse KG",
    "description": "New range of formal shirts are designed keeping you in mind. With fits and styling that will make you stand apart",
    "street1": "35115 Schreiner Village",
    "street2": null,
    "city": "Nord Elisabethburg",
    "zip_code": "43577"
  },
  "status": 200,
  "message": "Organisation created successfully"
}

<!-- ENDRESPONSE -->

<!-- RESPONSE 401 -->
{
  "message": "E_UNAUTHORIZED: The action you try to perform is only allowed for authenticated users.",
  "code": "E_UNAUTHORIZED"
}

<!-- ENDRESPONSE -->

<!-- RESPONSE 404 -->
{
  "message": "E_ROW_NOT_FOUND: Row not found",
  "code": "E_ROW_NOT_FOUND"
}
